类 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.HMaster
的使用

使用 HMaster 的软件包
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group   
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master   
 

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group 中 HMaster 的使用
 

参数类型为 HMaster 的 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group 中的方法
static int ServerWithGroup.getRegionNumOnGroup(HMaster hmaster, java.lang.String groupname, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap)
          Get region number of a group
static int ServerWithGroup.getRegionOfTableOnServer(HMaster hmaster, java.lang.String table, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HServerInfo server)
          Get region number of a table on a regionserver
static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> ServerWithGroup.initGroupMap(HMaster master, java.lang.String confline)
          Initialize groupmap for regionserver System will delete offline regionserver from configuration file and add new online regionserver into DEFAULT_GROUP
static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> ServerWithGroup.initGroupPropertyMap(HMaster master, java.lang.String confline)
          Get group property grouppropertymap from configuration line ,if this group is special ,it will be set true , and when move regionserver groups ,it will force update new configuration and jars
static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor> ServerWithGroup.listAllTables(HMaster hmaster)
          List all tables in hbase system
static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo> ServerWithGroup.listRegionOnRegionServer(HMaster master, java.lang.String servername)
          Read region information stored in regionserver , we get this information directly from HRegionInterface
static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo> ServerWithGroup.listRegionsInServerFromMeta(HMaster hmaster, java.lang.String servername)
          Read region information of regionserver from .META. region
static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor> ServerWithGroup.listTableOnRegionServer(HMaster master, java.lang.String servername)
          List all online tables stored on regionserver
static java.lang.String ServerWithGroup.readGroupInfo(HMaster master, java.lang.String confpath)
          Read regionserver information form hdfs to a String line Configuration file is stored in hdfs://${hbase.rootdir}/groupinformation.conf Format : groupname1;isSpecial;regionservername1;regionservername2: groupname2;isSpecial;regionservername3
static void ServerWithGroup.writeGroupInfo(HMaster master, java.lang.String confpath, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> grouppropertymap)
          Write regionserver groupinformation back to hdfs
 

参数类型为 HMaster 的 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group 中的构造方法
ProcessMove(java.util.Set<MoveGroupPlan> movegroupPlanset, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> grouppropertymap, HMaster master, java.lang.String currentdir)
          Construct method for thread
